title: Bland Hitman Action Film 'Bang' Trailer with Peter Weller & Jack Kesy
description: "You don't retire. Who retires?" Saban Films has debuted an official trailer for Bang, a very generic action thriller movie from Thai filmmaker Wych Kaos who has been making lots of genre movies most haven't seen. And many won't see this either. It's getting a VOD release this summer if anyone wants to watch - but it just doesn't seem worthwhile. It follows a ruthless hitman who, after narrowly escaping a fatal attempt on his life, betrays his gang in an effort to find forgiveness but ends up becoming a target himself. Bang, one of the most feared hitmen, questions his violent life after a near-death experience. Seeing a new future beyond bloodshed, he wants out—but his old crime boss won’t let go without a fight. Starring Peter Weller, Jack Kesy, Tristin Mays, Kane Kosugi, and Bear Williams. This one looks as bland and forgettable as they come – not really worth a watch unless you need to see another hitman movie with the same plot as others. TRAILERS

by
June 11, 2025
Source: YouTube

"You don't retire. Who retires?" Saban Films has debuted an official trailer for Bang, a very generic action thriller movie from Thai filmmaker Wych Kaos who has been making lots of genre movies most haven't seen. And many won't see this either. It's getting a VOD release this summer if anyone wants to watch - but it just doesn't seem worthwhile. It follows a ruthless hitman who, after narrowly escaping a fatal attempt on his life, betrays his gang in an effort to find forgiveness but ends up becoming a target himself. Bang, one of the most feared hitmen, questions his violent life after a near-death experience. Seeing a new future beyond bloodshed, he wants out—but his old crime boss won’t let go without a fight. Starring Peter Weller, Jack Kesy, Tristin Mays, Kane Kosugi, and Bear Williams. This one looks as bland and forgettable as they come – not really worth a watch unless you need to see another hitman movie with the same plot as others.

Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Wych Kaosayananda's action movie Bang, direct from YouTube:

"Once a killer, now the mark." Bang (Jack Kesy), one of the most feared hitmen, questions his violent life after a near-death experience. Seeing a future beyond bloodshed, he wants out—but his crime boss won’t let go without a fight. Bang is directed by Thai genre filmmaker Wych Kaosayananda (aka Wych Kaos), director of the films Fah, Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever, Angels, Tekken: Kazuya's Revenge, Zero Tolerance, The Driver, Paradise Z, and One Night in Bangkok previously. The screenplay is written by Peter M. Lenkov and Ken Solarz. It's produced by Scott Clayton, Tara L. Craig, Jordan Gertner, Jeffrey Giles, Peter M. Lenkov, Michael Lurie, Adam Zachary Smith. Saban Films debuts Wych Kaos' Bang action film in select US theaters + on VOD to watch starting July 11th, 2025 coming soon this summer. Anyone actually want to watch?
